channel.title: Webclient Help please :P
channel.description: Hey guys, I jarred and signed my client, I made it into a webclient, whenever I try to load it, it says error connection to server... please report. I'm sure it's something with the cache so I relinked the signlink to my cache, still same error, can anyone help? Or send me another signlink, something?

item.title: Webclient Help please :P
item.dc:creator: @oxygen1 oxygen-_
item.description:
@oxygen1 wrote:

Go in to your client files, and delete EVERY SINGLE .class file in the client, and re compile.
Then re jar and re sign

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient Help please :P
item.dc:creator: @Vinxy Vinxy
item.description:
@Vinxy wrote:

oxygen, could you give me a hand?? i followed HybridPvP’s webclient tutorial, done everything to the letter, and its not working? i get this error in the top left, and if i click for more detaisl its says something about not being able to find client.class

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient Help please :P
item.dc:creator: @David321 David321
item.description:
@David321 wrote:

You have to put download link in client.java also. to find it Ctrl+f and type in connecting than press enter and just roll a bit down there u see link and just pur your cache link inside and name it what name u have to ur cache. Good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient Help please :P
item.dc:creator: @oxygen1 oxygen-_
item.description:
@oxygen1 wrote:

search .zip in client.java, replace the download link and cache name there, search .zip as many times as you can in client.java and change to your clients cache name…

go to cachedownloader.java and look for the cache download link and replace it with yours(usually around the top)

and go into signlink.java and search for the “C:” thing and under that somewhere it will have cache name.
replace that with your cache name.
save it all and compile and walah.

Read full topic
